attributes.action: Impose automatic deportation of any asylum or imigrant who break british laws.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that any asylum seeker or immigrant who breaks british law should be imediatly deported back to their country of origin. This should take precidence over their proposed safety in their own country of origin. If people wanted to remain in the UK they would respect our laws.
